rev.comment: Replaceable fair use of living person, no rationale
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:World's funniest animals screenshot.jpg|175.px|right]]
 
'''Matt Gallant''' (born June 25, 1964) is an [[United States|American]] [[television host]]. He is well-known as the former host of the [[Emmy Award]]-winning ''[[The Planet's Funniest Animals]]'' on [[Animal Planet]]. He has also served as a guest judge on various other television shows featuring animals and pets. Gallant in, ''co-hosted ''[[Xbox Live]]: Launch Party'' and ''[[Game On (U.S. TV series)|Game On]]'' (2002), and hosted Simon Cowell's ''[[American Inventor]]'' in 2006. Matt Gallant is now featured on [http://www.directtv.com Direct TV]'s Help/Information Channel.
'''Matt Gallant''' (born June 25, 1964) is an [[United States|American]] [[television host]]. He is well-known as the former host of the [[Emmy Award]]-winning ''[[The Planet's Funniest Animals]]'' on [[Animal Planet]]. He has also served as a guest judge on various other television shows featuring animals and pets. Gallant in, ''co-hosted ''[[Xbox Live]]: Launch Party'' and ''[[Game On (U.S. TV series)|Game On]]'' (2002), and hosted Simon Cowell's ''[[American Inventor]]'' in 2006. Matt Gallant is now featured on [http://www.directtv.com Direct TV]'s Help/Information Channel.
